name: Exported Anki Flashcard Deck
summary: An APKG file is a custom deck of flashcards created for use in Anki, a flashcard-based studying program. It is a .ZIP archive that contains an .anki2 database file, images, and a media file. Users can create their own Anki flashcard decks or import others' by selecting the Create Deck or Get Shared buttons found in the app.
